instruction: Tell me about MITRE ATT&CK datasource: Drive - DS0016
output:
Ofcourse. Below is the description for MITRE datasource 'Drive (DS0016)':
A non-volatile data storage device (hard drive, floppy disk, USB flash drive) with at least one formatted partition, typically mounted to the file system and/or assigned a drive letter

parsed_raw_data.question: Tell me about MITRE ATT&CK datasource: Drive - DS0016
parsed_raw_data.answer:
Ofcourse. Below is the description for MITRE datasource 'Drive (DS0016)':
A non-volatile data storage device (hard drive, floppy disk, USB flash drive) with at least one formatted partition, typically mounted to the file system and/or assigned a drive letter

instruction: Describe datasource named Malware Repository - DS0004
output:

Information obtained (via shared or submitted samples) regarding malicious software (droppers, backdoors, etc.) used by adversaries

instruction: Can you please describe the MITRE ATT&CK datasource: Windows Registry (DS0024)?

instruction: Can you please describe the MITRE ATT&CK datasource: 'File (DS0022)'
output:
Indeed. Description for MITRE ATT&CK datasource 'File (DS0022)':

A computer resource object, managed by the I/O system, for storing data (such as images, text, videos, computer programs, or any wide variety of other media).
